name: Foundation
description:
PF is cluttered, hard to use, and full of useless features no one cares about. Foundation (code by King Vesper) removes anything not absolutely essential to the game. Gone are avatars, signatures, backgrounds, borders, icons, and more!

This does not break the rules. Support for Ads will be added when they are introduced. 

This style is a WIP. 
Optimized for 2 & 3 Column View.
additional_info: Please see my thread on PF for FAQs and information regarding installing, editing, and updating. Guide Thread on PokéFarm! SUPPORTED PAGES: - Lab, Party, Farm, Shelter, Scour, Daycare, PokéDex, Public Forum, Fields, Wishforge, Userpage, Summary Page, Popup Settings, News, Hunting Pages (Shiny, Albino), Private Messages, Online List. UPDATE LOG: 03/01/16: Added Option to change accent color. 03/01/16: Updated code for style errors as pointed out by Colress; minor color updates. 02/29/16: Screenshots Added; accent link color (#F18686) added to help increase contrast in userlinks. 02/29/16: Foundation Code is running well; all pages fully styled. 02/25/16: Rough base code is up and running; many pages are have no custom CSS applied.
